sections.heading: Short title. This Article may be cited as the Data Governance and Organization to Support Equity and Racial Justice Act
sections.text: References in this Article to "this Act" mean this Article.

sections.heading: Findings.  The General Assembly finds the following:
sections.text: Findings. The General Assembly finds the following:

sections.heading: Data governance and organization to support equity and racial justice.
sections.text: Data governance and organization to support equity and racial justice.

sections.heading: Construction of Act. Nothing in this Act shall be construed to limit the rights granted to individuals or data sharing protections established under existing State and federal data privacy and security laws
sections.text: Construction of Act. Nothing in this Act shall be construed to limit the rights granted to individuals or data sharing protections established under existing State and federal data privacy and security laws.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
